li.label: Venomous Strikes
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} strikes with the lethal precision of an insect's venomous sting. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks inject deadly toxins into enemies, weakening and debilitating them with every blow.

li.label: Quick Sting
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the speed and agility of a darting insect, striking before enemies even realize {PAWN_pronoun} is there. {PAWN_pronoun} lands precise blows, leaving opponents stunned in {PAWN_possessive} wake.

li.label: Hive Mastery
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} commands the unity of the swarm, manipulating insects and beasts alike with the cunning and strategy of a queen. {PAWN_pronoun} commands loyalty and obedience from those under {PAWN_possessive} control.

li.label: Chitinous Toughness
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} possesses the resilience of hardened chitin, shrugging off pain and exhaustion with ease. Like an insect's exoskeleton, {PAWN_pronoun} endures where others falter, continuing the fight with unyielding strength.

li.label: Toxin Resistance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is resistant to the toxins and venom that would fell lesser beings. {PAWN_pronoun} thrives in even the most polluted and dangerous environments, unscathed by poison and filth.

li.label: Poison Gourmet
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} can craft meals with the subtlety of a venomous insect, using toxins and poisons as both ingredients and tools. {PAWN_pronoun} creates dishes that balance potency and flavor, ensuring nothing goes to waste.

li.label: Pheromonal Influence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes pheromones that influence and command those around {PAWN_pronoun}, drawing allies in like ants to a queen. {PAWN_pronoun} ignites loyalty and passion in those who follow.

li.label: Toxic Remedy
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} possesses an innate understanding of poisons, using toxins to heal rather than harm. {PAWN_pronoun} creates remedies and cures, turning venomous substances into potent healing agents for those who need it most.

li.label: Pollinator's Gift
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures life and growth, like an insect spreading pollen from plant to plant. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} treads, nature thrives, and the land is replenished with new vitality.
